abstract: The move to buy Business Objects underlines the appeal of software that can cull through data to help companies cut costs, spot sales opportunities and outwit rivals.
snippet: The move to buy Business Objects underlines the appeal of software that can cull through data to help companies cut costs, spot sales opportunities and outwit rivals.
lead_paragraph: SAP, the big German software company, has agreed to buy Business Objects, a leader in the fast-growing market for business intelligence software, for $6.8 billion.

headline.main: SAP to Buy Maker of Business Software
headline.print_headline: SAP to Buy Maker of Business Software
